SELECT a.NTT_SJ , a.NTCR_ID , a.NTCR_NM , a.NTT_NO , a.NTT_CN , a.PASSWORD , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , a.NTCE_BGNDE , a.NTCE_ENDDE , a.RDCNT , a.USE_AT , a.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.BBS_ID , a.NTT_ID , a.PARNTSCTT_NO , a.ANSWER_AT , a.ANSWER_LC , a.SORT_ORDR , c.BBS_TY_CODE , c.BBS_ATTRB_CODE , c.REPLY_POSBL_AT , c.FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT , c.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_NUMBER , c.BBS_NM FROM LETTNBBS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNBBSMASTER c ON a.BBS_ID = c.BBS_ID
WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND a.NTT_ID = #{nttId}

SELECT a.BBS_ID , a.BBS_TY_CODE , b.CODE_NM as BBS_TY_CODE_NM, a.BBS_INTRCN , a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE , c.CODE_NM as BBS_ATTRB_CODE_NM , a.BBS_NM , a.TMPLAT_ID , d.TMPLAT_NM , d.TMPLAT_COURS , a.FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT , a.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_NUMBER , a.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_SIZE , a.REPLY_POSBL_AT , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , e.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM , a.USE_AT , DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , ( SELECT IFNULL(USE_AT,'N') FROM LETTNBBSUSE WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND TRGET_ID IN (
1 , 'SYSTEM_DEFAULT_BOARD' ) ) as AUTH_FLAG FROM LETTNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CODE_ID , CODE , CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y' ) b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CODE_ID , CODE , CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009' AND USE_AT='Y' ) c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNTMPLATINFO d ON a.TMPLAT_ID = d.TMPLAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER e ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = e.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId};

SELECT a.NTT_ID , a.NTT_SJ , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , IFNULL(b.USER_NM, a.NTCR_NM) as FRST_REGISTER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , a.RDCNT INQIRE_CO , a.PARNTSCTT_NO , a.ANSWER_AT , a.ANSWER_LC , a.USE_AT , a.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.BBS_ID , a.NTCE_BGNDE , a.NTCE_ENDDE FROM LETTNBBS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND a.NTT_SJ = #{nttSj} ORDER BY a.SORT_ORDR DESC, NTT_NO ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0;
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(NTT_ID),0)+1 AS NTT_ID FROM LETTNBBS;
